source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video opens with a medium close-up shot, featuring a shirtless young man positioned in the center of the frame and in the middle ground, holding an unlit cigarette to his lips. Flanking him in the background are two candelabras, one on the left and one on the right, each holding several lit white candles. A hand, with a white sleeve visible, enters the frame from the left foreground and moves towards the center, using a silver lighter in the foreground to light the man's cigarette, which remains in the center middle ground. The man then inhales from the lit cigarette. As he exhales a large plume of white smoke that billows from the center middle ground towards the foreground, the camera zooms in, transitioning to a close-up shot that focuses on his face and the smoke. The camera remains at the subject's level throughout.
